Label: Respondent sequence number
Comment: Respondent sequence number.

Label: Gender
Comment: Gender of the participant.

Label: Age in years at screening
Comment: Age in years of the participant at the time of screening. Individuals 80 and over are topcoded at 80 years of age.

Label: Age in months at screening - 0 to 24 mos
Comment: Age in months of the participant at the time of screening. Reported for persons aged 24 months or younger at the time of exam (or screening if not examined).

Label: Race/Hispanic origin
Comment: Recode of reported race and Hispanic origin information

Label: Age in months at exam - 0 to 19 years
Comment: Age in months of the participant at the time of examination. Reported for persons aged 19 years or younger at the time of examination.

Label: Country of birth
Comment: In what country {were you/was SP} born?

Label: Citizenship status
Comment: {Are you/Is SP} a citizen of the United States? [Information about citizenship is being collected by the U.S. Public Health Service to perform health related research. Providing this information is voluntary and is collected under the authority of the Public Health Service Act. There will be no effect on pending immigration or citizenship petitions.]

Label: Length of time in US
Comment: Length of time the participant has been in the US.

Label: Education level - Children/Youth 6-19
Comment: What is the highest grade or level of school {you have/SP has} completed or the highest degree {you have/s/he has} received?

Label: Education level - Adults 20+
Comment: What is the highest grade or level of school {you have/SP has} completed or the highest degree {you have/s/he has} received?

Label: Marital status
Comment: Marital status

Label: Pregnancy status at exam
Comment: Pregnancy status for females between 20 and 44 years of age at the time of MEC exam.

Label: Language of SP Interview
Comment: Language of the Sample Person Interview Instrument

Label: HH ref person's gender
Comment: HH reference person's gender

Label: HH ref person's age in years
Comment: HH reference person's age in years

Label: HH ref person's country of birth
Comment: HH reference person's country of birth

Label: HH ref person's education level
Comment: HH reference person's education level

Label: HH ref person's marital status
Comment: HH reference person's marital status

Label: Full sample 2 year interview weight
Comment: Full sample 2 year interview weight.

Label: Full sample 2 year MEC exam weight
Comment: Full sample 2 year MEC exam weight.

Label: Annual household income
Comment: Total household income (reported as a range value in dollars)

Label: Participant
Definition: Someone who takes part in an activity. [def-source: NCI]

Label: Screening
Definition: The time period during which a screening process is used to determine the inclusion of a subject in a study. [def-source: CHEAR]

Label: Examination
Definition: A formal or careful inspection of an object or subject. [def-source: NCI]

Label: Birth
Definition: Birthing is the process by which a biological organism is brought into existence. [def-source: SIO]

Label: Pregnancy
Definition: The time during which one or more offspring develops inside a woman. [def-source: CHEAR]

Label: Interview
Definition: A conversation with an individual regarding his or her background and other personal and professional details, opinions on specific subjects posed by the interviewer, etc. [def-source: NCI]

Label: Instrumentation
Definition: Any object, or item of electrical or electronic equipment, which is designed to carry out a specific function or set of functions. [def-source: NCI]

Label: Household
Definition: A household consists of one or more people who live in the same dwelling and also share meals or living accommodation, and may consist of a single family or some other grouping of people. A single dwelling will be considered to contain multiple households if either meals or living space are not shared. The household is the basic unit of analysis in many social, microeconomic and government models, and is important to the fields of economics and inheritance. [def-source: CHEAR]

Label: Household reference person
Definition: Head of Household is a filing status for individual United States taxpayers. To use the Head of Household filing status, a taxpayer must: (1) Be unmarried or considered unmarried at the end of the year (2) Have paid more than half the cost of keeping up a home for the tax year (either one's own home or the home of a qualifying parent) (3) Usually have a qualifying person who lived with the head in the home for more than half of the tax year unless the qualifying person is a dependent parent. [def-source: CHEAR]
